lender.name: Paula

lender.name: Caroline

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: because I can. I have been fortunate in life, and if my loan can help make someone's life better, why not?

lender.name: Don Roberts
lender.loan_because: I like to help other entrepreneurs achieve their dreams...especially the ones who are taking their first steps.
lender.occupational_info:
I introduce qualified buyers with institutional holders of distressed properties and notes. My mission in business is to understand my clients' goals and challenges...and to align myself with the solution tailored to their needs.
Tweet with me on Twitter (@DonRoberts).
The following is my great big, "Why":
If you're like me, you won't forget this image...and, you'll be inspired by it (don't worry, it's not gory or gross...it really will inspire you):
http://www.water.cc/wp-content/themes/lwiv7/images/home-promo/01.jpg
Pictured is a 2-liter bottle filled with dirty water. This is the only quality of water that *884 Million* people in the world have access to. A child dies every 15 seconds because of the lack of clean water...really.
Villagers can walk miles to a stream or river that animals are drinking from...& relieving themselves into...filthy, diseased-laden, dirty water.
Let that sink in for a moment...
Now, try to imagine...just for a moment...that things somehow got switched around such that you and one of the villagers traded places. And, it was permanent...
Now, you're the unfortunate, unknown villager hiking for miles...each day...to fetch 5-gallons of filthy water for drinking, cooking, bathing, etc.
And, you get to balance the 5-gallon bucket of water...on your head...for the walk back to the village. (Have you ever lifted a 5-gallon bottle of water before? Now, think about trying to hoist that up on top of your head...and balance it while you walk...)
You have no options. Drink your diseased water...or just die. And, you'll likely become very ill and die anyway because you're drinking, bathing, and cooking with diseased water.
Poof! You're back safely in your home now. Your nightmare is over...but, not their's.
You can take a sip from any number of water fountains. There are countless bottles of spring water awaiting you at the grocery store. You can even hose off your sidewalk with your clean water and never think twice about it.
You have options. They don't.
It costs us on the average $0.98 US to provide clean, safe water to one person for one year. Just one buck? Can you look at yourself in the mirror and say to yourself that you are not willing to take out just one dollar?
Join me in sending whatever you can to Living Water International (http://www.water.cc/).
Think of the countless lives *you* have the power to improve...
It will take only a few moments of your time, you won't miss a few bucks, and you'll drastically improve the lot in life for so many people who have it no where near as good as you.
Thank you!
That's my global "Why". And, I'm thinking about adding a Bloom Energy box to each village, too.
What's your "Why"?

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference in people's lives without resorting to the charity that too often comes without civic responsibility on the part of the recipient. Money lent through microfinance can do much more good when temporarily in the pockets of small business entrepreneurs in poor countries than it can whilst sitting idle in my bank account.
lender.occupational_info: I work at The Ohio State University managing contracts for research. I handle contracts with private companies interested in sponsoring research here at the largest university in the US. OSU does roughly $400 million in research every year.

lender.name: kerry
lender.loan_because: I live in the U.S. and feel extremely spoiled when I see what people in other countries have to go through.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the health and safety department.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I believe in contributing back to society (as a whole) while allowing individuals who possess the desire and ambition to provide a better life for themselves, and their families but lack the monetary “bridge” to accomplish that goal.

lender.loan_because: sou grato em caso de umaparceria no ramo de cama,mesa e banho aqui no nordeste pois e muito promissor!

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I can, and it matters
lender.occupational_info: I do scientific research aimed at understanding how the human brain allows us to learn

lender.loan_because: "The King will reply, 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.' " Matt. 25:40

lender.name: Mert Sahinoglu

lender.occupational_info: My job is to make people find the best home through the power of internet. http://www.metroseo.com

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I believe someone not getting a loan because of where they are from is ridiculous. Anyone with a business that has promise with the right financial support deserves a chance. Kudos to Kiva in making that a possibility.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the operations of a world-wide private bank.

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help SEM Fund, but they do not have any loans on your site right now so this loan is a donation.
lender.occupational_info: I celebrated my 100th birthday on December 20th and I want others to know they should never stop giving.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Illinois Certified Public Accountant.

lender.name: Rose

lender.occupational_info: I'm a singer and soon to be a music teacher, living in Copenhagen.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves in business.
lender.occupational_info: Tile Contractor.

lender.name: Jeff & Renee & Family
lender.loan_because: We love God and care for people.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I just want to help others less fortunate than myself. I may not have much to offer, but I do know from experience that a helping hand is always welcomed no matter how big or how small it may be.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library. It has it quiet days...lol! Get it? Quiet days. Ok ok not so funny. All kidding aside I enjoy my job and couldn't see myself doing anything else. At least for now.

lender.name: Bruce & Golboo
lender.loan_because: For the cost of a meal at a restaurant that can affect my digestive system for 3 hours, I can affect someone's life. Teaching a person to fish is wonderful, but it doesn't hurt to lend them a hook and a line either! :)
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate large scale IT contracts.

lender.loan_because: Our social responsibility committee at AES -WR wants to help businesses from around the world prosper in order to help end poverty.

lender.name: Kevin

lender.name: Franz

lender.name: Laura

lender.occupational_info: Creating one world, one community where everyone has the same opportunities and privileges.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It's my responsibility to give others the chance to succeed and be able to stand on their own
lender.occupational_info: I give loans to companies that can't get loans from banks

lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur myself, I know how hard it can be to get started - even when you have the money. If everyone gave just a little to help others, what a great world this could be!

lender.name: David

lender.name: Amanda

lender.name: Steve & Anne
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed, and want to pass that on to help our brothers and sisters in Christ.

lender.name: Adam

lender.name: Bryn
lender.loan_because: Put your money in a bank and pay someone's bonus. Put your money in Kiva and pay someone's school fees.

lender.name: Mica

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to see people succeed in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: i provide business solutions through the use information technology

lender.name: Frederic Valiquette
lender.loan_because: I think if everyone would make small change, it would make a big difference. I'm trying to help people close from me and also elsewhere in the world. Kiva is amazing for this.
lender.occupational_info: My name is Frederic Valiquette. I'm working on the internet. I'm a consultant in marketing and traffic.

lender.name: PK Banker
lender.loan_because:
according to the Constitution of Liberty we are supposed to do everything we can to help tired hungry huddled masses. No matter what anyone says, poor people are people, too! They are even almost as good as us, but with no money. For the price of an extremely large cup of coffee, we can throw our change at the world's poor and finally put an end to their yearning to breathe free!!
That's what KIVA means to me!

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to someone and this is almost too easy.
lender.occupational_info: I design and write computer programs to help people get their work done faster.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it's my small contribution to help others
lender.occupational_info: i work with customers to design software that helps their business

lender.name: Kelly

lender.occupational_info: I operate a website, DietFacts.com, which helps people monitor the nutrition content of the foods they eat.

lender.name: Thomas

1.) As Zig Ziglar stated: You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.

lender.occupational_info: I work to better understand sea turtles and their role in a healthy sea. I do field research, write, teach and anything else necessary to make a positive difference for these animals and the seas, reefs, sea grass meadows and beaches they depend on.

" The poor stay poor not because they are lazy, but because they have no access to capital" - Milton Friedman
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a Toronto high school.

lender.name: Madhavi & Suresh

lender.name: CHICHI

God has been great to me and i know first hand how it feels to be poor with full of ideas and no money to put them into action... Hopefully my GRANITO DE ARENA will help change someone's Life.
lender.occupational_info: JACK OF ALL TRADES, MASTER OF NONE...lol

lender.name: 1 Happy Fam!

lender.occupational_info: I am a philosophy student at the University.

lender.name: Melissa

lender.name: Heitor

lender.occupational_info: I'm a major from Brazilian Army.

lender.name: Nadira

lender.name: Lin

lender.occupational_info: I'm working on my degree in Psychology. I hope to be a teacher one day!

lender.name: chi

lender.occupational_info: Trabajo en la Promocion del desarrollo de pequeños empresariosl. I work in the entreprenuership development.

lender.name: Hanoch
lender.loan_because: I am a student trying to find a direction in life and often waste my money on frivolous, unnecessary and impulse buys. My donations through Kiva help me invest in people who really need the money and ensure that I will have the money saved for the future, perhaps to loan to others.
lender.occupational_info: I have a college degree, speak English, Spanish and Mandarin but am unable to find a job.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think that if somebody is bold enough to ask for a loan in this fashion, then they actually have the drive to make their dreams a reality, and I want to help.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: ... I believe micro-credit loans are a successful means of preventing human trafficking.
lender.occupational_info:
My colleagues and I work primarily in the Washington, DC area and in Southeast Asia to promote programs that are addressing the root causes of human trafficking, and to provide sustainable alternatives.
We have financed many micro-credit loans for women and men in Thailand who want to start their own businesses as an alternative way to make a living for their families so that they're not circumstantially forced to take work that would be degrading or demeaning to them.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people get the start they need to succeed.

lender.name: Rob Drumm
lender.loan_because: It is pure luck that I live with enough money. I feel that I have no choice but to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help newborns take their first breath.

lender.name: Christian C.
lender.loan_because: I know I can. Right now, I'm not a millionaire like most students dream of becoming but at least with helping out others I can give these innocent people a chance to dream.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student working part time as a bank teller. I'm hoping to graduate soon and work in the media industry doing production work.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Because I care about people all over the world and own a business where we help business owners and individual become their true selves.
lender.occupational_info: I am COO of Rapid Success Partners. We help you find your love and joy in your business.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I test software and try to find problems so they can be fixed before anybody uses it.

lender.name: Darcie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a good life for themselves.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: i want to help people all over the world.

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: As a librarian, I realize that people need resources to succeed. This is just a natural extension of what I already do -- provide people with resources.
lender.occupational_info: I help students find information that they are seeking or direct them to a place where they can find their answers.

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: This is rewarding in many ways. I have been very fortunate in my life and have very supportive parents, boyfriend and friends. This is the least I can do for persons that are trying to better themselves and others.

lender.name: Cecil
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to work in a field I enjoy and want to help others find what they enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers to create Internet pages and programs for others to use.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: i WANT PEOPLE TO HAVE A CHANCE.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: together our small contributions can change someone’s life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people living in poverty obtain gainful employment by overcoming social, health and education barriers.

lender.name: Kristiann
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to help people around the world who may not be as fortunate as myself.

lender.name: badmamas

lender.occupational_info:
Mom is the greatest job in the world, messy, happy, crazy, loud, silly, scary and fun.
We wouldn't choose any other job!!

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives better. I loan to women because we will save the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids to speak a foreign language and help kids retain their mother tongue.

lender.loan_because: We believe we should all help each other, this is a unique opportunity to participate and help others make themself independant

lender.name: Petra Reneyvo
lender.loan_because: I need more fund to expand my computer business in my CyberCAFE in Tomohon, North Sulawesi - Indonesia.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Indonesia Male, age 33, married, and have 4 children. I live in a beautifull City called Tomohon in North Sulawesi, Indonesia. Since 1996, what I do for living are to service people for their computer needs (consulting, programming and troubleshooting in Personal Computers, Notebooks and Local Area Network. Because the growing of internet in my area is very fast, I open a internet cafe since December 2006. In my business (CyberCAFE Tomohon), I rent computer to people, who use computer for browsing, chatting, gaming or work. Right now, I have 10 computer client and 1 server. The service are for 24 hours, except for Sunday or Holiday. I planned to add more computer to my CyberCAFE and if possible, I want to open a computer store and services.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: people have helped me, and now I pass that help on to other people. Keep spreading the love!
lender.occupational_info: I work on a national forest in Alaska, taking care of hiking trails, campgrounds, and cabins.

lender.name: Priti and Anil
lender.occupation: MBA Candidate, Class of 2012 at Duke University
lender.loan_because: I vividly remember the time when financial struggles challenged my aspirations, at which time a kind and generous soul paused to believe in me and my dreams. Today, life has come full circle as we pause to believe in these enterprising people and their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: She lives in the world of Global Health. I'm at The Fuqua School of Business at Duke University.

lender.occupational_info: I help people to do their jobs more efficiently.

lender.name: Kirsi

lender.name: THERESA & ALI
lender.loan_because: Kiva is the all time best idea for people helping people help themselves! What a wonderful way to care about our fellow human beings.

I'm a high school student. I made this account a few months ago, after i got a 25$ certificate for this site over Christmas.

lender.loan_because: Having visited many of these regions, I find the people to be warm, friendly, and hard-working. If there is something I can do to help, I will.

I also loan this money in memory of my sweet cat, George who loved to eat, sleep, smash dishes, the aroma of roses and leather and most of all, he loved me. Rest in peace, Georgie.
lender.occupational_info: I love to invest in human creativity and potential. Every human being deserves a chance and then one chance more. I pay attention to persons who need it.

lender.name: Mette

lender.loan_because: This started for me as a class project, but I foresee reinvesting this money again and again. It's a relatively small amount of money, but through combined participation/donation it makes a tangible impact in the lives of many.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can't wait to see how it will be used!
lender.occupational_info: I try to be creative and come up with images that will inspire others.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I've been turned down by a bank when I needed a bicycle. Now I have a little money and thinking that it could help others, the chance to become the man who says yes to bicycle loans appeals greatly. I heard about micro banking on the BBC world service a few years ago, the results seemed a truly remarkable.
lender.occupational_info: I draw and write for children's books. It's wonderful to be able to work at something I love and get paid for it. It did take a few years to get established but now it goes well.

lender.name: The Ayala Family
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.

lender.name: Yamel

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.occupational_info: I am a researcher who is trying to stop the spread of AIDS around the world. I have seen that poverty is the root cause of many behaviors that lead to HIV infection, and I try to do what I can to end poverty in the world.

lender.name: Femmy & Henk
lender.loan_because: We believe in the way KIVA operates and want to contribute.

lender.name: Nila Uthayakumar

lender.name: Earnest and Andrea

lender.name: Sarah

I feel that Kiva Loans are a branch of what I do within my business and I am happy to loan.

lender.name: Josef

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: i believe we can all use a boost from time to time. We all have a burning passion in our hearts to share and to give back. I love to be a part of that collective urge.

lender.name: Lorene
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Lorenzo
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all people need is a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Routine but once in a while really bad things happen.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: This approach to aid builds self esteem in the recipient and allows them to dream about the future. It also creates a neighbourly feeling between people across the world.
lender.occupational_info: Editing written material for a large government website, plus working with the technology of the site.

lender.name: Jason Bade
lender.loan_because: Every little bit adds up to make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at university.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: To help others less fortunate. I'm helping others to better themselves. I'm giving them a helping hand rather than a hand out.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We tend to forget how fortunate we are living in the United States. I want people in other countries to have the "American" dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: intelligence and hard work deserve the right push.
lender.occupational_info: I create cartoons that people can use to explore and imagine beyond what we see everyday.

lender.name: Kirsti
lender.loan_because: I can. No other reason needed.
lender.occupational_info: I translate books from English and Swedish into Norwegian. When I'm not working, I'm most likely singing.

lender.name: ThePrintedCanvas
lender.loan_because: its a wonderful way empower those with the entrepreneurial spirit to lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We create custom printed gallery wrapped canvases.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I can! I was born into a wealthy part of the world and I have an obligation to my fellow humans to assist as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help to draft environmental laws. These laws protect the environment of my province for the benefit of humans and other animals.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing through Kiva is an easy way to help.
lender.occupational_info: Public service.

lender.name: Solomon
lender.loan_because: helping and protecting man is my life's work and legacy.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: even (or especially) in the current economic downturn, it's important to not forget about those who need help.
